content: yarn 6 b double_crochet over the top of previous round sl-st chain 4 behind petal circle 8 double_crochet 8 chain- repeat from to 7 more times slip_stitch to first st to join space 7 b sl into chain-space chain 3 counts as first double_crochet 4 double_crochet in same chain-space 3 square 44 double_crochet 4 chain- double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in next chain-space double_crochet in next chain-space repeat from space to 3 more times omitting final double_crochet slip_stitch to first st to join 8 b double_crochet in each st along side and 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in corner chain-space square 60 double_crochet 4 chain- slip_stitch to first st to join break yarn space 9 d 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in corner chain-space bpdc around each st along square 60 bpdc side repeat from to 3 more times slip_stitch to first st to join 16 double_crochet 4 chain- break yarn and finish off all ends space catkitbob designs bijou1 140825v2 page 2 of 2
